content.raw:
@{557058:5de38267-b118-494c-aa76-4fab35448816} i tried running this test but both tricycles are moving at the same speed. --verbose isn’t telling me anything wrong with the plugin. I’m running with the latest source built version from this branch.

Is there a step that I’m missing somewhere? Also, I had to lower the gravity vector since the models would basically fly past with the default settings.
content.html:
@Steve Peters i tried running this test but both tricycles are moving at the same speed. --verbose isn’t telling me anything wrong with the plugin. I’m running with the latest source built version from this branch.

Is there a step that I’m missing somewhere? Also, I had to lower the gravity vector since the models would basically fly past with the default settings.
